# BB8

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

BB8 manages and analyses the large datasets for monitoring and evaluation of biosecurity.

## Installation

You can install the development version of BB8 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("GitMaMojoWorkin/BB8")
```

## Example


```{r example}
library(BB8)
## basic example code
```



```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```



```{r pressure, echo = FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```
